reviewText: Very interesting learning video. Very useful knowledge. Unique.
Anything by Deb Menz if you are into fiber is a great read!

I love Deb Menz!
She gives many approaches for makiing interesting yarn batts for spinning ....in case one doesn't work ...try another!
She makes it simple and inspires
I have her book too but the DVD is easier to follow
So glad I got it!
